sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>change_request</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sysapproval_approver</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Approval History</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
	var query=gs.getMessage('state=approved^sysapproval={0}',parent.sys_id);
	current.addEncodedQuery(query);
	//current.addQuery('document_id', parent.sys_id);
	//current.addQuery('state','approved');
	

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>sysapproval</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-02 17:19:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>495a4042dbe0730019565d50cf9619da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Approval History</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_495a4042dbe0730019565d50cf9619da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-03 10:29:04</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=495a4042dbe0730019565d50cf9619da"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_929ab34edb2c730019565d50cf96199a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ApprovalHistory</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ApprovalHistory</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Utility class for change request server side calls
 *
 * @class
 * @author Amit Gujarathi [S4AXNZ]
 * @extends global.module:sys_script_include
 * @memberof global.module:sys_script_include
 */
var ApprovalHistory = Class.create();
ApprovalHistory.prototype = {
   initialize: function () {
	},

	/**
	 * Default values to change request attributes
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord Current object of change request
	 * @param {String} fieldName Dictionary name to get the default value for
	 * @returns {String} Default value based on change type for the field name passed
	 */

	getChangeDefaultValue: function (changeRecord, fieldName) {
		var defaultValuesMap = {
			"normal": {
				"risk": 2,
				"impact": 1,
				"priority": 4
			},
			"standard": {
				"risk": 3,
				"impact": 3,
				"priority": 4
			},
			"emergency": {
				"risk": 3,
				"impact": 3,
				"priority": 4
			}
		};

		if (gs.nil(fieldName)) {
			return '';
		}

		var fieldValue = defaultValuesMap[changeRecord.type][fieldName];
		if (fieldValue) {
			return fieldValue;
		} else {
			return '';
		}
	},

	/**
	 * Get the Approval group based on the configuration id selected on the change request, this function called from Normal change workflow
	 *
	 * @param {Object} Current object of change request
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of Approval Group
	 */
	getChangeApprovalGroup: function (current) {
		return current.cmdb_ci.change_control;
	},

	/**
	 * Remove the user from approvers list if he/she is requestor or if he/she already approved in previos phases
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord current object of change request
	 * @param {Object} group approval group sysid
	 * @returns {String} Sys IDs of Approval Group members
	 */
	getApproversForFourEyePrinciple: function (changeRecord, group) {

		var groupMembers = [];
		// List of users who already approved the change request
		var previousApprovers = (function () {
			var changeApprovedUsers = [];
			var changeApprovers = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
			changeApprovers.addQuery("sysapproval", changeRecord.sys_id);
			changeApprovers.addEncodedQuery("state=approved");
			changeApprovers.query();
			while (changeApprovers.next()) {
				changeApprovedUsers.push(changeApprovers.getValue("approver"));
			}
			return changeApprovedUsers;
		})();

		var approverUsers = (function () {

			var grGroupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
			grGroupMembers.addQuery('group', group);
			grGroupMembers.addEncodedQuery("user!=" + changeRecord.requested_by);
			grGroupMembers.addQuery("user", "NOT IN", previousApprovers);
			grGroupMembers.addNotNullQuery("user");
			grGroupMembers.query();
			while (grGroupMembers.next()) {
				groupMembers.push(grGroupMembers.getValue("user"));
			}
			return groupMembers;
		})();

		return groupMembers;
	},

	/**
	 * Get all change task assignmnet group members email IDs
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord current object of change request
	 * @returns {String} Email id of chnage task assignmnet group members
	 */
	getChangeAndTaskGroupUsers: function (changeRecord) {

		var allReciepents = [];
		var changeRequestSysId = changeRecord.sys_id;
		var changeGroup = changeRecord.assignment_group;
		var changeTasks = new GlideAggregate("change_task");
		changeTasks.addQuery("change_request", changeRequestSysId);
		changeTasks.addNotNullQuery("change_request");
		changeTasks.addNotNullQuery("assignment_group");
		changeTasks.groupBy('assignment_group');
		changeTasks.query();
		while (changeTasks.next()) {

			var groupMember = new GlideRecord("sys_user_grmember");
			groupMember.addQuery("group", changeTasks.getValue("assignment_group"));
			groupMember.addNotNullQuery("group");
			groupMember.query();
			while (groupMember.next()) {
				allReciepents.push(groupMember.user.email);
			}
		}


		var arrayUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		return arrayUtil.unique(allReciepents);
	},

	/**
	 * Create Approval History record
	 *
	 * @param {Object} changeRecord Glide object of change request
	 * @param {String} approvalGroupSysId Sys ID of the assignment group
	 * @param {String} approvalType Type of approval
	 * @returns {String} Sys ID of the Approval record created
	 */
	createApprovalHistory: function (changeObject, approvalGroupSysId, approvalType) {
		if (gs.nil(changeObject)) {
			return;
		}
		var changeSysId = changeObject.getValue('sys_id');
		var changeStateDV = changeObject.getDisplayValue('state');

		//Get the latest Approved/Rejected approval record details
		var latestApprovalDetails = (function () {
			var out = {
				'sys_id': '',
				'comments': ''
			};
			var approvalRec = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
			approvalRec.addQuery('sysapproval', changeSysId);
			approvalRec.addEncodedQuery('stateINapproved,rejected');
			approvalRec.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
			approvalRec.setLimit(1);
			approvalRec.query();
			if (approvalRec.next()) {
				out.sys_id = approvalRec.getValue('sys_id');
				//Get the last added comment from the comments field
				out.comments = (function () {
					var comm = approvalRec.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
					if (comm) {
						return comm.split('\n').filter(function (elm) {
							return elm.indexOf('(Comments)') == -1;
						}).join('\n');
						//return comm.split('\n\n')[0].split('\n')[1];
					} else {
						return '';
					}
				})();
			}
			return out;
		})();

		try {
			new x_swre_tsk_history.SRApprovalHistory().createApprovalHistory(
				changeSysId, 
				latestApprovalDetails.sys_id, 
				approvalGroupSysId, 
				changeStateDV, 
				approvalType, 
				latestApprovalDetails.comments
			);
		}
		catch (e) {

		}

	},

	/**
	 * Validate CTask Planned start date should fall in between change request planned dates
	 * 
	 * @param {any} changeTask
	 * @returns {Boolean} 
	 */
	isValidPlannedStartDate: function(changeTask) {

		var plannedStartDate = new GlideDateTime(changeTask.getValue('planned_start_date'));
		var startDate = new GlideDateTime(changeTask.change_request.start_date);

		var ctaskDateinSeconds = parseInt(plannedStartDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var changeDateinSeconds = parseInt(startDate.getNumericValue())/1000;

		return (parseInt(ctaskDateinSeconds)-parseInt(changeDateinSeconds)) < 0;
	},

	/**
	 * Validate CTask Planned End date should fall in between change request planned dates
	 * 
	 * @param {any} changeTask
	 * @returns {Boolean} 
	 */
	isValidPlannedEndDate : function(changeTask) {

		var plannedEndDate =new GlideDateTime(changeTask.getValue('planned_end_date'));
		var endDate =new GlideDateTime(changeTask.change_request.end_date);


		var ctaskDateinSeconds = parseInt(plannedEndDate.getNumericValue())/1000;
		var changeDateinSeconds = parseInt(endDate.getNumericValue())/1000;

		return (parseInt(changeDateinSeconds)-parseInt(ctaskDateinSeconds)) < 0 ;
	},



    type: 'ApprovalHistory'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-03 10:43:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>929ab34edb2c730019565d50cf96199a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ApprovalHistory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_929ab34edb2c730019565d50cf96199a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-03 10:43:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_producer_3a25637b47701100ba13a5554ee490a0
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueon_desktopfalsefalse95fc11615f1211001c9b2572f2b477c60523da512c611228900811a37c97c20141970-01-03 00:00:00Service category requests enable creation and publishing of services for:

  • Inquiry
  • Request / Fullfill (ask for something, receive it)
  • Purchase items on behalf of the organization

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the service category. You can assign editors or delegate / give manager authority to anyone in your department.

Once this request is approved, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your services. You will also be sent a link to the request table associated with the service requests.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Mobile_Record_incident</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if(gs.isMobile()){
		//gs.addInfoMessage(gs.isMobile());
		current.u_mobile_created=true;
	}
	current.update();
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-02 10:37:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>270036f1dbec330019565d50cf961946</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mobile_Record_incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_270036f1dbec330019565d50cf961946</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-02 12:20:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=270036f1dbec330019565d50cf961946"/></record_update>
